email.description: Server for sending emails via SMTP and creating Todoist tasks.

filesystem.description: Server for all file system operations including read/write, CSV, Excel, and compression.

github.description: Server for interacting with GitHub repositories, including fetching repository information and managing pull requests.

git.description: Server for Git operations such as committing changes, pushing to remote repositories, and pulling updates.

os_info.description: Server for retrieving operating system information such as OS type, version, and hardware details.

data_format.description: Server for handling data format conversions and transformations (JSON/XML parsing).

web.description: Server for web search (Brave Search API) and fetching web page content.
